description:
Ryo helps a nun who lost her rosary while spending one drunken night of freedom before saying her vows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mayoeru Sister: Mokkori wa Ai no Omichibiki!?
Sister in Doubt - Mokkori is her guide to love ?
Und führe mich nicht in Versuchung
迷えるシスター もっこりは愛のお導き!?
